attacks.name: Moonlight Fang
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Umbreon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Quick Blow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Blessed Wings
attacks.text: Remove all damage counters from each of your Pokémon. Shuffle Togekiss and all cards attached to it back into your deck.

attacks.name: Air Cutter
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Steel Coat
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

ability.name: Allergy Flower
ability.text: Each player can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Dazzling Pollen
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

attacks.name: Miracle Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Stun Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

ability.name: Defense Sign
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Grass Pokémon by attacks.

attacks.name: Mach Wind
attacks.text: During your next turn, Vespiquen's Retreat Cost is 0.

attacks.name: Charging Horn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Afterimage Strike
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if Scyther would be damaged by an attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that attack's damage done to Scyther.

attacks.name: Double Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Enraged Assault
attacks.text: If Vespiquen is on your Bench and has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.name: DARK
ability.text: Once during your turn,when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your deck for a Darkness Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Slap Down
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

cards.name: Team Rocket's Trickery
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Draw 2 cards. Then, your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.text: During your next turn, Pineco's Surprise Attack attack's base damage is 80.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Darkness Energy
text: If the Pokémon Darkness Energy is attached to attacks, the attack does 10 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). Ignore this effect if the Pokémon that Darkness Energy is attached to isn't Darkness. Darkness Energy provides Darkness Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

cards.name: Burned Tower
text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

Once during each player's turn, that player may flip a coin. If heads, the player searches his or her discard pile for a basic Energy card, shows it to his or her opponent, and puts it into his or her hand.

cards.name: Defender
text: Attach Defender to 1 of your Pokémon. Discard this card at the end of your opponent's next turn. Any damage done to the Pokémon Defender is attached to by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Energy Exchanger
text: Choose an Energy card from your hand, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Legend Box
text: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. If you reveal both halves of a Pokémon LEGEND, put those cards onto your Bench and attach all revealed Energy cards to that Pokémon LEGEND. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck. (You can play only 1 Pokémon LEGEND in this way.)

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Kyogre & Groudon LEGEND
cards.artist: Shinji Higuchi + Sachiko Eba/樋口真嗣 + 江場左知子
text: Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Kyogre & Groudon LEGEND.

attacks.name: Stun Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Opponent's Choice
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck and your opponent chooses 1 of them. Put that card into your hand and the other card on the bottom of your deck. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Razor-Sharp Incisors
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gnaw Up
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Single Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Sticky Liquid
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Dual Draw
attacks.text: Each player draws 3 cards.

ability.name: Retreat Aid
ability.text: As long as Dodrio is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.

attacks.name: Incessant Peck
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Balloon Tackle
attacks.text: Drifblim does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Take Away
attacks.text: Shuffle Drifblim and all cards attached to it back into your deck. Then, your opponent shuffles the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck. (You choose your new Active Pokémon first.)

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: During your next turn, Scyther can't use Slashing Strike.

attacks.name: Sleeping Spell
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Jolteon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Vaporeon.

attacks.name: Dual Splash
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Metal Sound
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Minimize
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Drifloon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chase Up
attacks.text: Search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Togetic during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Selfish Draw
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your hand. If not, discard it and draw a card.

attacks.name: Destructive Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Detect
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sky Uppercut
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

cards.name: Metal Energy
text: Damage done by attacks to the Pokémon that Metal Energy is attached to is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). Ignore this effect if the Pokémon that Metal Energy is attached to isn't Metal. Metal Energy provides Metal Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

ability.name: Evolution Memories
ability.text: Espeon can use the attacks of all Pokémon you have in play that evolve from Eevee as its own. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Solar Ray
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Plead
attacks.text: Ask your opponent if you may draw 2 cards. If yes, draw 2 cards. If no, this attack does 20 damage to the Defending Pokémon.

cards.name: Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND

ability.name: Space Virus
ability.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND, take 1 more Prize card.

text: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND.

attacks.name: Ozone Buster
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND.

attacks.name: Solar Suggestion
attacks.text: Move up to 4 damage counters from any of your Pokémon to any of your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Ninja Fang
attacks.text: If, before Gliscor does damage, the Defending Pokémon has no damage counters on it and is then damaged by this attack (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Fire Counterattack
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Fighting Pokémon in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Dark Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Lava Flow
attacks.text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Magcargo. If you do, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded.

attacks.name: Double Headstrike
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Spike Spread
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Gyro Ball
attacks.text: You may switch Forretress with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blindside
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Shadow Bind
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Vengeance
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Darkness Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Miasma Wind
attacks.text: Does 50 damage times the number of Special Conditions affecting the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Soothing Scent
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Quad Smash
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Fresh-Picked Fruit
attacks.text: Remove 6 damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Claw Snag
ability.text: Once during your turn, when you play Weavile from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. Choose a card from your opponent's hand and discard it.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scrap Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Lairon.

attacks.name: Sludge Drag
attacks.text: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pester
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Pull Out
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for any 1 card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Dark Hand
attacks.text: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Full-Belly Refresh
attacks.text: Remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from Slowbro.

attacks.name: Startling Trip
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, Slowbro is now Confused.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Rambunctious Party
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose as many Basic Pokémon as you like and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

ability.name: Active Volcano
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Energy card, attach it to Slugma. This power can't be used if Slugma is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Beat Up
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each of your Pokémon in play. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Flower Shop Lady
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Search your discard pile for 3 Pokémon and 3 basic Energy cards. Show them to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.

ability.name: Voltage Increase
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Lightning Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Raichu. This power can't be used if Raichu is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mega Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to Raichu.

ability.name: Red Armor
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to Scizor by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy cards attached to them.

attacks.name: Metal Scissors
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to Scizor.

ability.name: Cloud-Covered Moon
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Umbreon is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, return Umbreon and all cards attached to it to your hand. This power can't be used if Umbreon is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Evoblast
attacks.text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Pokémon in play that evolves from Eevee.

cards.name: Kyogre & Groudon LEGEND
text: Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Kyogre & Groudon LEGEND.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Mega Tidal Wave
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards from your opponent's deck. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Massive Eruption
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards from your deck. This attack does 100 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

cards.name: Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND
cards.artist: Shinji Higuchi + Sachiko Eba/樋口真嗣 + 江場左知子
text: Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND.

cards.name: Alph Lithograph
text: Return any Stadium card in play to its player's hand!

ability.name: Hustle Step
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Bellossom is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Dance 'til Dawn
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Bellossom is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Mirror Shot
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Everyone Explode Now
attacks.text: Does 30 damage times the number of Pineco and Forretress you have in play. This attack does 30 damage to each of your Pineco and Forretress in play.

ability.name: Portrait
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Backward Belt Throw
attacks.text: You may do 80 damage plus 20 more damage. If you do, Hariyama does 20 damage to itself.

ability.name: Mischievous Trick
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your face-down Prize cards with the top card of your deck. This power can't be used if Rotom is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Plasma Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tickle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Ruins of Alph
text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.
Each Pokémon in play has no Resistance.

cards.name: Sage's Training
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose any 2 cards you find there and put them into your hand. Discard the other cards.

ability.name: Fire Breath
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. This power can't be used if Houndoom is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
